title: Kayle is broken yet Ryze gets 4 reworks before they even look at Kayle.
body: IDK if riot only looks at pro play health, but I think Kayle has been a op broken champ for a long time, yet riot is not even discussing this. Meanwhile Ryze gets reworked 4 times before they get it right. What a waste of resources. Kayle could have gotten 1 of those reworks.

replies.body:
Kayle broken ? Lmao. I'm a Kayle main and if you want to beat her pick Akali, Nasus, Tryndamere, Leblanc, Yasuo(but you MUST be super agressive), Xerath, Annie, Mundo. Everyone of these champions can soundly defeat her when played with some sense. Kayle is not close to being broken. You have to think of her like Nasus, weak early strong late.

If you want to counter her in general, {{item:3211}} + {{item:3111}}. Those two items alone render her helpless against you until she's like 4 to 5 items and those items MUST include some form of magic pen. Kayle might seem strong but trust me, she had far more weaknesses than your average meta picks.

(Ryze has only been reworked 3 times btw, try not to spread mis-information thanks)
She's actually not that bad at all, she has a somewhat oppressive kit against certain match-ups in the top lane, but so do Teemo, Singed and Darius.
She's super weak to CC and Squishy as all hell. She pushes by default due to the AOE on her third ability, and her ultimate is actually very fitting for such an immobile and squishy champion. 
Kayle's hit is somewhat out-dated by current Riot standards, but beyond being oppressive at times, it's weak if anything.
She has pretty gimped kit, but it's hardly broken by overpowered standards.

They said they want to hit other parts of his kit besides his damage, as that's not really where his issues lies, but in the shield and speed boost.
